attributes.action: Revise School Holidays to make it fit for purpose for this Modern Age living.
attributes.additional_details:
On one hand, Summer Holidays are too long causing burn outs among parents where as on other hand Winter Holidays are too short to do anything. (most time goes by in Christmas plus new year celebration)
Here we proposing balancing of those holidays in such a way that both holidays can be best enjoyable ( including Travel which doesn't need to be bound to summer months and/or European countries)
attributes.background:
A. Reduce Summer Holidays from 6 weeks to 3.5/4 Weeks
B. Increase Winder Holidays from 2 weeks to 3.5/4 Weeks
C. If Possible, Choose start date Region wise so whole country doesn't start/finish holidays on same day
Parenting has greatly evolved through many generations so why not school Holidays?

rejection.details:
